text: Kuya Imulungu kamwing'a Abrahamu chihendo cha kwingitsa ngoma chiwe chitango che laghano lyake. Apfo Abrahamu kamwingitsa ngoma imwanaghe Isaka litsuwa lya nane kulawa hayoneke. Na Isaka pfipfila kamwingitsa ngoma imwanaghe Yakobu. Naye Yakobu kawatendela pfipfo awala iwabala wetu kumi na weli.
